import React from 'react' import useInput from 'client/components/useInput' import 'pages/login/Login.module.css' function index() { const [email, bindEmail, resetEmail] = useInput('') const [pass, bindPass, resetPadd] = useInput('') const submitHandler = e => { if (email==='aaa@hotmail.com' && pass==='test'){ e.preventDefault() alert('Success!') resetEmail() resetPass() } else{ e.preventDefault() alert('Try again!') } } return (
) } export default index
